title: On Convergence of Extended Dynamic Mode Decomposition to the Koopman Operator

tldr.text: An analytic version of the EDMD algorithm is proposed which, under some assumptions, allows one to construct the Koopman operator directly, without the use of sampling, and convergence of the predictions of future values of a given observable over any finite time horizon is implied.
